modName: Necromancer Total War of Might and Magic
descriptionHtml:
First i have done the mod for me, its a only reason way to play for me with my mod, it was my aim to change the game, no more boring tundra running with few wolfes and bandits, i have placed many invaders , fights and boss monsters....
When i have played skyrim my hero was overpowered and he can kill everything in that game, but now this is a good challange for me, its playable on the easyest difficulty with a low level character but its very hard

you need the original Skyrim Monster mod from dogtown1
http://www.vgunetwork.com/files/file/1028-skymomod-v12/
or this link
http://www.moddb.com/mods/skymomod-v12

Dawnguard is required

The Necromancers are back! They want destroy the life and create a new world full of darkness and pain.

But that is not enough,Demons from the east and wild Barbarians from the west invade the land. No one knows their plans , but a total war is comming!
You can find mighty and marriageable followers for hard battles but the enemy is strong.And you must be prepared enough or you will lose.


You can find some random battles and kill the enemy, foil the plan of the Necromancers, Devils and Beasts. Beware though, they are are large in numbers, and several insanely strong monsters have been witnessed.

Meet some other mortal followers with Heroic might . You join them in Battles, ... i think the project is 20% done.......

This mod has no incompatiblity! And nothing is replaced, i have add the Monsters and Npcs , they will work together with other factions.


Enemy Factions:
Necromancer Faction (Undead) work together with their Bandit minions

Kreegan Faction(Devils) with Dremora and Warlock Faction

Krewlod Faction(Barbarians) with Forsworn Faction

Based On The Might & Magic Series


Credits :
Holugar,lifestorock, AlphaWolF,Vicn,asianboy345,CrushOverwrite,BlueFreakQ,Natterforme, jaysus
author: yoyoyo

files.name: Necromancer Total War

new Krewlod invaders in the Tundra
new monsters
new difficulty balance
